resources.string: Bay Area grown and raised. I discovered backpacking in 2019 and it has become the main event of my weekend warrior antics. Ask me which backpacking permits I\'m applying for this season! I also just love being active in general, whether it means trying to do more frequent runs or taking long walks to San Francisco bakeries to try all their pastries. Bay Area grown and raised. I discovered backpacking in 2019 and it has become the main event of my weekend warrior antics. Ask me which backpacking permits I\'m applying for this season! I also just love being active in general, whether it means trying to do more frequent runs or taking long walks to San Francisco bakeries to try all their pastries.
